Class Summary
AbstractRpcProvider  
AbstractStateHandler<S,O> Simple class to add support for reading and writing state.
BeforeRestoreStateEvent<S,O> Fires before state has been restored.
BeforeSaveStateEvent<S,O> Fires before state has been saved.
BorderLayoutStateHandler  
ComponentStateHandler<S,C extends Component> Abstract state handler for Components, capable of using the widget's stateId property as a key instead of being given one.
CookieProvider The default Provider implementation which saves state via cookies.
GridStateHandler<M>  
HtmlStorageProvider Simple HTML5 Storage implementation of the state provider.
Provider Abstract base class for state provider implementations.
RestoreStateEvent<S,O> Fires after state has been restored.
SaveStateEvent<S,O> Fires after state has been saved.
StateManager This is the global state manager.
TreeStateHandler<M> Watches the expanded state of the tree, and stores it under the given key.
